name: CVE-2011-4814
description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr 3.1.0 RC and probably earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the PATH_INFO to (1) index.php, (2) admin/boxes.php, (3) comm/clients.php, (4) commande/index.php; and the optioncss parameter to (5) admin/ihm.php and (6) user/home.php.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:*:rc:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.7.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
